abstract.locale: Base class for all shape elements.

description.locale: The 'fill' property specifies that the interior of the given graphical element must be painted.
The 'fill-opacity' specifies the opacity of the painting operation which shall be used to paint the interior the current object.
The 'stroke' property shall paint along the outline of the given graphics element.
The 'stroke-linejoin' specifies the shape which shall be used at the corners of shapes when they are stroked.
The 'stroke-linecap' specifies the shape which shall be used at the end of open subpaths when they are stroked.
The 'stroke-dasharray' specifies the pattern of dashes and gaps that shall be used to stroke paths.
The 'stroke-width' specifies the width of the stroke which shall be used on the current object.
The 'stroke-opacity' specifies the opacity of the painting operation used to stroke the current object.

value.name: matrix(a b c d e f)

description.locale: Specifies transformation matrix [a b c d e f]
Specifies a translation by tx and ty.
Specifies a scale operation by sx and sy.
Specifies a rotation by rotate-angle degrees about a given point.
Specifies a skew transformation along the x-axis.
Specifies a skew transformation along the y-axis.
This attribute specifies a list of coordinate system transformations to apply to the element it appears on. The individual transform definitions are separated by white space and/or a comma.
